00049     class _OgreExport SimpleRenderable : public MovableObject, public Renderable
00050     {
00051     protected:
00052         RenderOperation mRenderOp;
00053 
00054         Matrix4 m_matWorldTransform;
00055         AxisAlignedBox mBox;
00056

00059

00062

00065

00068

00074 
00075         virtual void setRenderOperation( const RenderOperation& rend );
00076         virtual void getRenderOperation(RenderOperation& op);
00077 
00078         void setWorldTransform( const Matrix4& xform );
00079         virtual void getWorldTransforms( Matrix4* xform ) const;
00080 
00081

00083

00085         virtual const AxisAlignedBox& getBoundingBox(void) const;
00086

00090             bool debugRenderables = false);
